text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Good work...
It feels like it's been a while for everyone...

Yeah yeah, even though we're in the same production,
the shoots are all over the place~!
That's right.

─Still, it's a fun set where you can talk
to someone from the cast.

Haha, that fun vibe is coming through.
Thanks to that, the drama feels pretty good, doesn't it?

Oh, praise...!
I hope the fans enjoy it too.

I think you don't need to worry about that...!
Plus...

Since the roles are close to everyone, they're naturally
playing them, and I think each character is well-liked.

I'm sure everyone in L'Antica
will feel closer to each other, right?

Which means...
Haha, things are going well, huh?
Or rather, close to the roles?
I don't think I'm similar at all though.

Eh~? Mamimi is fashionable
and has a kind side, just like you~!

Haha... Of course, not everything is the same,
but I think that role suits you perfectly, Mamimi.

Well, if that's the case,
it means I'm doing a good job acting, right?

Haha... Interacting with Mamimi-chan...
was fun...

The characters...
Even though it's the first time we've met...

We're gradually...
getting closer...

...Ah, The way we're slowly
closing the distance feels somehow nostalgic──

Hehe~...
It tickles a bit, but it makes me happy~...!
